name: Casino Shooter
description:
Casino shooter is an  original random shooting game of rolled dice coming from every side to attack your casino wheel at the center.

You control a casino wheel with at least one gun barrel. After each shoot, you receive a new rolled dice as a new bullet. You must aim at a rolled dice with the same number to increase your score. If your rolled dice bullet has a greater number then the targeted dice then it will disappear without scoring. Conversely, your dice bullet disappear but the targeted dice number is decremented. If a dice collide your casino wheel, you loose one life.

You goal is to maximize your score while maintaining you casino wheel alive !
